pages.text: $(li)Max Level = 3 $(li)Treasure = False $(li)Tradeable = True $(li)Rarity = Rare $()$(br)Values can be different from pack to pack

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Increases damage the lower your attack speed is. $(br)Faster weapons will deal less damage

pages.title: Transcended
pages.text: Required Level = 200 $(br2)Attack Speed will be reduced
